sentences.english: Bow and sword and battle I will abolish from the land, so that all may lie down in safety.
sentences.chinese: 又必在国中折断弓刀，止息争战，使他们安然躺卧。
受试是国中二年级80名学生。

sentences.english: CCTV has a greater coverage than any station.
sentences.chinese: 中国中央电视台的覆盖范围比任何台都广。

sentences.english: Does the investment scale need approval from the Central or local government?
sentences.chinese: 投资规模是否需要中国中央政府或地方政府核准？

sentences.english: We cannot have the kingdom without the king.
Many Pakistanis call it the "state within a state".
sentences.chinese: 许多巴基斯坦人称其为“国中之国”。

sentences.english: And he disparages the CIA as a bunch of has-beens.
sentences.chinese: 他贬低美国中央情报局的一群已时期。
她是中国中央电视台的播音员。

sentences.english: I completed a Bachelor of Secondary Education and majored in English at Rizal Technological University.
sentences.chinese: 我大学念的是中等教育，主修英文，曾经在国中教书。

sentences.english: Inside the Country of Aolai， east of the ocean belonging to the Continent of Superior Body， there was the Mountain of Flowers and Fruit.
sentences.chinese: 东胜神州的傲来国中，有一座山，叫花果山。

sentences.english: Taiwan's TOEIC scores placed 6th among Asia's 12 countries this year.
sentences.chinese: 多益成绩表现，今年台湾在亚洲12国中得到第6名。

sentences.english: What is the epidemiology and impact of colorectal cancer in high-incidence countries?
sentences.chinese: 在结直肠癌高发国中其流行病学和影响是怎样的？

sentences.english: R. James Woolsey is chair of Woolsey Partners and a former director of the Central Intelligence Agency.
sentences.chinese: 伍尔西顾问公司董事长，曾任美国中央情报局局长。

sentences.english: Moreover, the Chinese central government appears to be softening its stand on imports.
sentences.chinese: 此外，中国中央政府似乎软化其对进口的立场。

sentences.english: China's prime minister said the central government, China-Australia relations have maintained good momentum.
sentences.chinese: 中国中央政府首相说，中澳关系发展势头良好。

sentences.english: And if a stranger sojourn with thee in your land, ye shall not vex him.
sentences.chinese: 若有外人在你们国中和你同居，就不可欺负他。
